description:
**Fix Overview**:

To improve accessibility of the Copilot feature in Windows:

1. The Copilot icon will now be displayed on the right side of the system tray on the taskbar.
2. This change enhances the entry point to Copilot by positioning it closer to where the Copilot pane opens.
3. The default setting for the 'Show the desktop' behavior in the far-right corner of the taskbar has been turned off, but this can be re-enabled in the taskbar behaviors section under settings.

**Details**:
- Users should navigate to taskbar behaviors settings to make adjustments based on their preferences regarding the desktop view.
